## array-helpers package

A library of helper functions related to arrays &amp; object arrays

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [\_add(array, value)](./array-helpers._add.md) | Add a value to the start of an array without mutating it. |
|  [\_addOrUpdateRange(originals, newEntities, identifier)](./array-helpers._addorupdaterange.md) | Merge two arrays of objects, updating any objects that overlap |
|  [\_convertArrayToObject(array, key)](./array-helpers._convertarraytoobject.md) | Convert an array to a key/value object |
|  [\_filter(originals, expression)](./array-helpers._filter.md) | Filter an array of items, only returning the ones who pass the specified expression |
|  [\_find(array, value, identifier)](./array-helpers._find.md) | Find an object in an array of objects |
|  [\_getRangeByIdentifier(originals, ids, identifier)](./array-helpers._getrangebyidentifier.md) | Get a range of objects |
|  [\_groupBy(array, key)](./array-helpers._groupby.md) | Group an array of objects by a specified key |
|  [\_removeByIdentifier(originals, deletedId, identifier)](./array-helpers._removebyidentifier.md) | Remove an object from an array of objects |
|  [\_removeRangeByIdentifier(originals, deletedIds, identifier)](./array-helpers._removerangebyidentifier.md) | Remove a range of objects from an array of objects |
|  [\_replace(array, obj, id, identifier)](./array-helpers._replace.md) | Replace an object in an array objects with a new value |
|  [\_sortByBool(collection, prop, trueFirst)](./array-helpers._sortbybool.md) | Sort an array of objects by a boolean property. |
|  [\_sortByDate(collection, prop, direction)](./array-helpers._sortbydate.md) | Sort an array of objects by a date property |
|  [\_update(array, updatedObj, identifier)](./array-helpers._update.md) | Update a object in an object array |
